frontMatter.title: How to apply
frontMatter.description: A landing page template that outlines eligibility requirements and provides application instructions.
frontMatter.intro: A landing page that outlines eligibility requirements, provides application instructions, and explains post-submission processes. This template is managed by the Content Management System.

when_to_use.value: **Benefit eligibility.** To guide users through understanding benefit eligibility requirements.
**Multiple application channels.** Present available application methods including online forms, phone, mail, in-person, and Veterans Service Officer support.
**Pre-application guidance.** Help users prepare required documents and information before starting.

structure.intro: The template guides users through understanding benefit eligibility and application options.

sections.title: Page Title and Subtitle
sections.description: H1 follows format: 'How to apply for [benefit name]'. Subtitle format: 'Find out how to apply for [benefit name] as a [audience]'.

sections.title: How to Prepare
sections.description: Lists required documents and information (Social Security number, military history, DD214, etc.). Includes link to corresponding Eligibility page.

sections.title: How Do I Apply?
sections.description: Presents available application methods (online, phone, mail, in person, with professional support).

sections.title: What Happens After I Apply?
sections.description: Links to detailed post-submission information and application tracking options.

sections.title: How Long Does It Take?
sections.description: Uses Number highlight Card variation to display typical processing timeframes and contact instructions.

sections.title: More Information
sections.description: Presented via Accordion or Related/Major links variations.

sections.title: Back-to-Top Component
sections.description: Enables quick navigation to page top.

sections.title: User Feedback Pattern
sections.description: Implements feedback collection at page bottom.

content_guidelines.value: Use plain language and conversational tone throughout.
Keep process list items brief with tailored, specific information.
Include estimated time burden for completing the form.
Explain post-submission timeline and next steps clearly.

accessibility.value: Ensure proper heading hierarchy throughout the page.
Provide descriptive link text for all navigation options.
